name: MSER
description: OpenCV MSER wrapper with FireSight filtering extensions.  Maximally stable extremal region extractor.  Used as a method of blob detection in images.

parameters.name: delta
parameters.description: delta, in the code, it compares (size_{i}-size_{i-delta})/size_{i-delta}. Larger delta yields fewer images. Default 5

parameters.name: minArea
parameters.description: prune the blobs whose area is smaller than minArea. Default 60

parameters.name: maxArea
parameters.description: prune the blobs whose area is bigger than maxArea. Default 14400

parameters.name: maxVariation
parameters.description: prune the area have simliar size to its children. Default 0.25

parameters.name: minDiversity
parameters.description: trace back to cut off mser with diversity < min_diversity. Default 0.2

parameters.name: maxEvolution
parameters.description: for color image, the evolution steps. Default 200

parameters.name: areaThreshold
parameters.description: the area threshold to cause re-initialize. Default 1.01

parameters.name: edgeBlurSize
parameters.description: the aperture size for edge blur. Default 5

parameters.name: color
parameters.description: if provided, matched regions will be colored with BGR Scalar having 1-4 values. For alternating colors, use: [-1,-1,-1,-1]

parameters.name: detect
parameters.description: Use "keyPoints" or "Rotatedrect" to return a JSON object to the stage model for each detected MSER region. Each KeyPoint is determined from eigenvectors and covariance matrix of region. The size field of the KeyPoint is calculated from the number of points in the region: size = 2*sqrt(region.size()/Ï€).  Each RotatedRect is calculated by minAreaRect()
